SEARCH:
模块 com.example.demo
程序包 com.example.demo.controller

类 Control_Start

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.controller.Control_Start
public class Control_Start extends Object
The Control_Start class is responsible for controlling the game's start process, including launching and transitioning between levels. It handles level loading using reflection, so levels can be dynamically loaded based on class names.

  • 字段详细资料

    • LEVEL_ONE_CLASS_NAME

      private static final String LEVEL_ONE_CLASS_NAME
      The class name for the first level. This constant stores the fully qualified class name for the first level of the game.
      另请参阅:
      • 常量字段值

    • LEVEL_WIDTH

      private static final double LEVEL_WIDTH
      The width of the level window. This constant defines the width of the window for the game level.
      另请参阅:
      • 常量字段值

    • LEVEL_HEIGHT

      private static final double LEVEL_HEIGHT
      The height of the level window. This constant defines the height of the window for the game level.
      另请参阅:
      • 常量字段值

    • stage

      private final javafx.stage.Stage stage
      The main stage for the application. This variable holds the primary stage (window) of the JavaFX application.

    • currentLevel

      private LevelParent currentLevel
      The current active level. This variable stores the instance of the current active level in the game. It is used to manage transitions and interactions with the active level.

  • 方法详细资料

    • launchGame

      public void launchGame() throws ClassNotFoundException, NoSuchMethodException, SecurityException, InstantiationException, IllegalAccessException, IllegalArgumentException, InvocationTargetException
      Launches the game by showing the primary stage and loading the first level.
      抛出:
      ClassNotFoundException - If the level class cannot be found.
      NoSuchMethodException - If the constructor for the level class is not found.
      SecurityException - If there is a security issue while accessing the class.
      InstantiationException - If the class cannot be instantiated.
      IllegalAccessException - If there is an illegal access to the class or constructor.
      IllegalArgumentException - If the constructor receives incorrect arguments.
      InvocationTargetException - If the constructor invocation throws an exception.

    • goToLevel

      private void goToLevel(String className) throws ClassNotFoundException, NoSuchMethodException, SecurityException, InstantiationException, IllegalAccessException, IllegalArgumentException, InvocationTargetException
      Navigates to the specified level by dynamically loading the class using reflection.
      参数:
      className - The class name of the level to be loaded.
      抛出:
      ClassNotFoundException - If the class cannot be found.
      NoSuchMethodException - If the constructor is not found in the class.
      SecurityException - If there is a security issue when accessing the constructor.
      InstantiationException - If the level class cannot be instantiated.
      IllegalAccessException - If the constructor cannot be accessed.
      IllegalArgumentException - If the constructor arguments are invalid.
      InvocationTargetException - If the constructor invocation fails.

    • showError

      private void showError(Exception e)
      Displays an error alert with the exception details.
      参数:
      e - The exception that occurred during level loading or game transitions.
